sentences.english: Discus throw is an ancient game among the throwing events.
sentences.chinese: 掷铁饼是投掷项目中一项古老的比赛。

sentences.english: One day Apollo decided to practice throwing the discus.
sentences.chinese: 某天，阿波罗决定练习掷铁饼。

sentences.english: The discus involves throwing a flat, round object.
sentences.chinese: 掷铁饼需要掷一个扁而圆的物体。

sentences.english: Events like the hammer and the discus are not traditional crowd-pullers in the West.
sentences.chinese: 掷链球和铁饼等在西方算不上传统的受欢迎项目。

sentences.english: Remember the famous statue Discobolos, of a man holding an iron disc?
sentences.chinese: 还记得那尊著名的“掷铁饼者”雕像吗？

sentences.english: Apollo lifted the discus and threw it high and far in the air.
sentences.chinese: 阿波罗举起铁饼向空中掷去掷得又高又远。

sentences.english: The final exertion is the key stage of the whole technical sequence in discus throw.
sentences.chinese: 掷铁饼技术的最后用力是整个技术过程的关键环节。

sentences.english: On the other side will be an image of an ancient Greek statue of a discus thrower.
sentences.chinese: 另一面则是一个古希腊掷铁饼者雕塑的图像。

sentences.english: The young track and field athlete could already hurl the discus 60 yards .
sentences.chinese: 这个年青的田径运动员已能把铁饼投掷60码远。

sentences.english: He was the first place in the discus throw.

definition: cricket (ball game)/also called 板球[ban3 qiu2]
